title: The Boarding School Experiment
description: There are three steps to taking revenge on the most popular, hottest guy in your senior class:• Stealth• Planning&• ExecutionAfter Elena fails at all of them, she’s tossed into a government run boarding school in Alaska. The worst part? Thane Trallwyn--her worst enemy and subject of her blown revenge--goes in with her.Alaska’s not big enough.
author: Emily  Evans
